document.full_text: dirk nowitzki knows how to take over a game when the dallas mavericks need him the most, and jason kidd can still make some big shots.
document.title: nowitzki, kidd carry mavericks past blazers in game 1
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki knows how to take over a game when the dallas mavericks need him the most, and jason kidd can still make some big shots.
